our single model.from sentence: shows that our single model , trained with two styles and controlled with the NQA style , pushed forward the state - of - the - art by a significant margin .

evaluation scores.from sentence: The evaluation scores of the model controlled with the NLG style were low because the two styles are different .

our model.from sentence: Also , our model without multi-style learning ( trained with only the NQA style ) outperformed the baselines in terms of ROUGE - L .
